snippet: Lauren Best stepped in to coach the Nazareth girls basketball team after the death of Apache Paschall, who led the team to state and federation championships in 2011.
abstract: Profile of Lauren Best, girls' basketball co-coach at Nazareth High School in Brooklyn; Best assumed the position with fellow assistant Ron Kelly after the sudden death of coach Apache Paschall, who led the team to state and federation championships in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Lauren Best stepped in to coach the Nazareth girls basketball team after the death of Apache Paschall, who led the team to state and federation championships in 2011.

headline.seo: At Nazareth, It’s Been a Season of Painful Losses for Girls’ Team
headline.main: Assuming a Heavy Mantle in a Season of Sorrow
headline.print_headline: Assuming a Heavy Mantle in a Season of Sorrow
